samples.title: Create a Word AI-Assistant Add-in
samples.shortDescription: A word add in interact with AI service and word document
samples.fullDescription: This add-in demonstrates Word add-in capabilities to insert content generated by AI or edited manually into Document Comment Footnote and Header. There're two mode: chat mode and predefined prompt prefix to generate text/picture.

samples.title: Create a Word AIGC Add-in
samples.shortDescription: A word add in interact with AI service and word document
samples.fullDescription: This add-in demonstrates Word add-in capabilities to insert content generated by AI or edited manually into Document Comment Footnote and Header. There're two mode: chat mode and predefined prompt prefix to generate text/picture.

samples.title: Create an Excel Mail Merge Add-in
samples.shortDescription: Using the Microsoft Graph API to send emails in Excel.
samples.fullDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use the Microsoft Graph JavaScript SDK to send emails in Excel from Office Add-ins.

samples.title: Custom Function Sample Using Web Worker
samples.shortDescription: Use web workers in custom functions to prevent blocking the UI of your Office Add-in.
samples.fullDescription: Shows how to use web workers in custom functions to prevent blocking the UI of your Office Add-in.

samples.title: Insert an external Excel file and populate it with JSON data
samples.shortId: Insert Excel file and populate JSON data
samples.shortDescription: Using the Excel JS API to insert data.
samples.fullDescription: This sample shows how to insert an existing template from an external Excel file into the currently open Excel file. Then it retrieves data from a JSON web service and populates the template for the customer.

samples.title: Word Writing Assistant
samples.shortDescription: A Word Add-in to assist writing with word document.
samples.fullDescription: This add-in demonstrates Word add-in capabilities to help users check errors, improve writing, and rephrase content.

samples.title: Word Social Login
samples.shortDescription: A Word Add-in to assist writing with word document.
samples.fullDescription: This add-in demonstrates Word add-in capabilities to insert content generated by AI or edited manually into Document Comment Footnote and Header. There're two mode: chat mode and predefined prompt prefix to generate text/picture.
